author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5161: Cannot rollback after syntax error in internal statement
Make sure the statement context is cleaned up on syntax errors.

author: markt
msg: Protect the DefaultServlet against Filters etc writing to the response which will a) break partial get support and b) mean setting on content length will result in a truncated response.
This also fixers some TCK failures since the TCK sometimes writes to the response with a filter.
